attributes.action: Do not pass illegal migration bill
attributes.additional_details: Instead, we would like the government to offer the majority of refugees and asylum seekers British citizenship, give them their deserved human rights and rule out any deportatiosn to Rwanda.
attributes.background: We believe that the UK governemnt should scrap its 'illegal migration bill' because it is racist as it fails to view refugees and asylum seekers as human beings and places a racist label on them as 'foreigners' or 'illegal immigrants'.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634311
